title: Fong Wei Ting
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Take-out, Taiwanese
description: 豐味亭, a non-veg turned veg eatery (since Sept 2011). Extensive menu includes mock meats, noodles, sprouts, tofu, soups, stews, and more. Staff understand special diet requests and seeks to promote a vegan lifestyle. Cozy atmosphere with dark wood settings, soft chairs, light windows. Seats 30. Quick service, some English spoken.
